string-array.name: ask_array
string-array.item: Of course I do love you.
Love me tender, love me sweet, tra-la-lo-lo-lo!11
Soft Olya, Warm Minras, Poeskin bal of furrr…
I am happiest when I’m right next to you.
I will love you until the stars go out, and the tides no longer turn.
Every time I see you, I fall in love all over again.
If I know what love is, it is because of you.
Let us Flip the coin and see. Head, I am yours. Tail, you are mine.
It is true that my heart always skips a beat when you take my name.

string-array.name: request_array
string-array.item: Oh, my unicornness! Love ya such much!
My dear bunny, I love you!
Your love is all I need to feel complete.
Loving you never was an option. It was a necessity.
Just when I think that it is impossible to love you any more, you prove me wrong.
